channel.title: Dicing requirements, please help
channel.description: Hello, I need a bit of help. I've made a dicing zone, but people keep spam trading the dicers, so I want to make it so only Dicers can trade to prevent spam traders. Also, how do I make it so there is a gfx around the dicers so the players know who the trusted dicers are, so they are not to get scammed. If you could help, I would love you forvever :hurr: Thanks in advance!
